item.title: Decoder-Only Transformers are SoTA Encoders (with some fine-tuning)
item.description: Decoder-only transformer architectures have taken over. Encoder-based transformer (encoder-only, encode-decode) architectures (e.g. BERT) are becoming something of the past, the latest encoder-based transformer was released ~2 years ago. Large research labs are no longer training encoder-based models, and this is for a good reason: encoder-based architectures are harder to scale.

item.title: Expire vs Remove. Which should we use in Fusion Cache?
item.description:
Expire vs Remove. Which should we use in Fusion Cache?

In this video, we go over some of the basic cache operations we have access to.

item.title: Master The Basics of MSTest Like a PRO In Under 15 minutes!
item.description:
For centuries one testing framework has dominated the donet scene... but is it all over for xUnit?!
In this video, we'll explore MSTest and how some of the great Microsoft Testing Platform capabilities have made their way in.
Is it enough to get you to move from xUnit?!
